data.prayer: Father, please make every disciple be a disciple maker, every home a training center, and every church a church planting movement in the state of Aibonito.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Aibonito, Puerto Rico
data.section_summary: What challenges do people here face?

data.prayer: Jesus, please give the apostles in Aibonito, Puerto Rico a vision for the harvest, and a passion to see the gospel spread to every corner of the the state.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up

data.label_1: One disciple of Jesus for every 3 lost neighbors

data.prayer: Spirit, please convict each believer in Aibonito, Puerto Rico to take up their calling as a priesthood of believers and pray for the 14,982 lost around them.
data.verse: you also, like living stones, are being built into a spiritual house to be a holy priesthood

data.prayer: Lord, stir the hearts of your people in the state of Aibonito to agree with you in prayer.
data.verse: I [Jesus] pray also for those who will believe in me through their message, that all of them may be one, Father, just as you are in me and I am in you. May they also be in us so that the world may believe that you have sent me.

data.prayer: Lord, we pray for the believers in Aibonito, Puerto Rico to be more like Jesus in their love for friends and enemies.
data.verse: But I tell you, love your enemies and pray for those who persecute you.

data.prayer: Father, make bold the prophets in Aibonito, Puerto Rico so that the church can be equipped with truth and insight and a vision of your heart.
data.verse: These are the things which you should do: speak the truth to one another; judge with truth and judgment for peace in your gates.

data.prayer: God, we ask you to raise up elders and deacons from the 7,218 believers in Aibonito, who will serve the church and equip it to do your work.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up until we all reach unity in the faith and in the knowledge of the Son of God and become mature, attaining to the whole measure of the fullness of Christ.
